Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 14 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Eye Rays, Each of the 10 eye stalks on the Beholder's bulbous head which have each been given a very descriptive name
Other Actions.Action 2: Charm Ray, The Beholder attempts to charm a target
Other Actions.Action 3: Paralyzing Ray, The Beholder attempts to paralyze a target
Other Actions.Action 4: Fear Ray, The Beholder attempts to frighten a target
Other Actions.Action 5: Slowing Ray, The Beholder attempts to slow a target, halving their movement speed
Other Actions.Action 6: Enervation Ray, The Beholder blasts a target with a necrotic ray
Other Actions.Action 7: Telekinetic Ray, The Beholder exerts a telekinetic grip on a target
Other Actions.Action 8: Sleep Ray, The Beholder attempts to induce sleep upon a target
Other Actions.Action 9: Petrification Ray, The Beholder blasts a target and begins to petrify them
Other Actions.Action 10: Disintigration Ray, The Beholder blasts a target with a force ray, disintigrating objects and any creature it kills
Other Actions.Action 11: Death Ray, The Beholder blasts a target, either killing them or dealing massive necrotic damage

Abilities.Ability 1: Antimagic Cone, The Beholder's central eye creates a cone of antimagic, similar to the antimagic field spell

Legendary Actions.Action 1: Eye Ray, The Beholder uses any one of its Eye Rays

Lair Actions.Action 1: The Beholder can cause a 50ft square area to become slimy
Lair Actions.Action 2: The Beholder can cause grasping appendages to sprout from walls, attempting to grapple any creatures near those walls
Lair Actions.Action 3: The Beholder can open an eye on a solid surface and fires a random Eye Ray through it, the eye then closes and disappears
